Key Match Events: Bam Adebayo finished with 23 points, nine rebounds, and 10 assists.
Trey Murphy III scored 34 points for the Pelicans.
Jimmy Butler returned after a five-game absence due to illness and scored nine points.
Herro made five straight three-pointers after missing his first four attempts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans have lost 15 consecutive road games, marking the 100th time in NBA history a team has had a road losing streak of 15 or more in the same season.
